BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h2>Issue</denchmark-h>
 
 When I try to get lemma of following sentence, the lemma of first word "At" is started with uppercase.
 
 'At that level of impact, gender equity is a top solution to restore a climate fit for life.'
 
 Do you guys have any idea why this is happening?
 (I reproduced it by Binder which is embedded at <denchmark-link:https://spacy.io/usage/spacy-101#annotations-pos-deps>https://spacy.io/usage/spacy-101#annotations-pos-deps</denchmark-link>
  )
 <denchmark-h:h2>Source</denchmark-h>
 
 import spacy
 nlp = spacy.load('en_core_web_sm')
 doc = nlp(u'At that level of impact, gender equity is a top solution to restore a climate fit for life.')
 for token in doc:
 print(token.text, token.lemma_, token.pos_, token.tag_, token.dep_,
 token.shape_, token.is_alpha, token.is_stop)
 spacy.info()
 <denchmark-h:h2>Result</denchmark-h>
 
 At At ADP IN prep Xx True True
 that that DET DT det xxxx True True
 level level NOUN NN pobj xxxx True False
 of of ADP IN prep xx True True
 impact impact NOUN NN pobj xxxx True False
 , , PUNCT , punct , False False
 gender gender NOUN NN compound xxxx True False
 equity equity NOUN NN nsubj xxxx True False
 is be VERB VBZ ROOT xx True True
 a a DET DT det x True True
 top top ADJ JJ amod xxx True True
 solution solution NOUN NN attr xxxx True False
 to to PART TO aux xx True True
 restore restore VERB VB relcl xxxx True False
 a a DET DT det x True True
 climate climate NOUN NN compound xxxx True False
 fit fit NOUN NN dobj xxx True False
 for for ADP IN prep xxx True True
 life life NOUN NN pobj xxxx True False
 . . PUNCT . punct . False False
